summary: This bill, the Supporting Modern Approaches in Recovery Technology for Traumatic Brain Injury Act (SMART for TBI Act), directs the Secretary of Defense to develop a strategy for treating traumatic brain injuries using digital health technologies. It mandates the establishment of a working group with experts from various fields to identify capability gaps, analyze existing research, and recommend investments. The Secretary is required to brief congressional defense committees on the strategy by September 30, 2026.
